A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Solid movie. Kind of slow at the beginning. I have say\, however\, the negative backlash from the vocal minority is ridiculous. I truly don’t get why this group is up in arms. These are the same people that said The force awakens was a shot for shot remake. Now the last Jedi was too different. Come on people. To compare to the prequels and rate this movie far lower just proves your illegitimate review. May the force be with you!
